tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserBehavior ( 
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50), 
    behavior_description TEXT, 
    last_interaction TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE user_behaviors (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    ar_content_url VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_settings (
    user_id UUID,
    contact_enabled BOOLEAN,
    location_enabled BOOLEAN,
    notification_enabled BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_experiences (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    experience_name VARCHAR(100),
    behavior_trigger VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);
CREATE TABLE users (     user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,     username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,     email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,     age INT,     gender VARCHAR(10)     );

CREATE TABLE user_behaviors (     behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,     user_id INT,     behavior_type VARCHAR(50),     behavior_timestamp TIMESTAMP,     FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)     );
CREATE TABLE ar_devices (     device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,     device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,     device_type VARCHAR(50),     user_id INT,     FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)     );
CREATE TABLE ar_content (     content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,     content_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,     content_type VARCHAR(50),     content_rating INT,     content_owner VARCHAR(50)     );

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (     preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,     user_id INT,     content_id INT,     preference_level INT,     FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),     FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES ar_content(content_id)     );
